metadata.title: Half-Naked Birdman and the Gang in Golem Paradise

tracks.text: Rakuro becomes Sunraku. Rei becomes Psyger-0. Kei becomes Oikatzo. Towa becomes Arthur Pencilgon.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Red light rolls right over humans. Green light rolls left over player characters. Rakuro and Sunraku, Towa and Pencilgon, Kei and Katzo, Rei and Psyger-0.
A green tower stands behind a fountain in the middle of a red-bricked town. Day turns to night. Red text, Shangri-La Frontier.
Sunraku stands in the Inventoria
Pencilgon and Katzo stand back to back
A mail bird lands on Psyger-0's arm.
A ninja runs at night.
Text, 26, Half-Naked Birdman and the Gang in Golem Paradise
A giant rib cage towers over off-kilter stone obelisks in a large, hilly expanse.
In a cloud of pink, Emul takes bunny form.
Text, Ruins of Past Glories
The metal bones are covered in moss.
Sunraku looks at Professor's friend request. He presses Yes.
Professor leaves. Emul bows 5 degrees.
Metal drops from above
A golem descends from above.
The worker golem's arm gun adjusts.
turns
and shoots a stream of flame at Sunraku. He runs.
A rock rolls up to them.
a metal arm emerges and grabs his leg.
it glows
She bats the rock with a hammer. It flies to a metal rib beyond them and explodes.
The metal arm remains in his leg.
Rocks roll then sprout legs. 20 feet away, a giant boulder with legs and eyes spits the rock golems out.
Sunraku readies his marsh daggers.
The boulder golem spits out rocks.
The rocks roll, stop, and sprout legs.
The rock golems gather in front of the party. One jumps at Sunraku, who jumps back.
Several rock golems leap at the party. They side step and dodge.
Several rock golems explode themselves.
Bilac bats rocks away.
Emul lies on the ground. She gets up and looks around a a crescent of rock golems.
They leap
She strikes 3 in the air. They explode.
A beam of light shoots from his sword, exploding rock golems.
More approach
Amariys and Emul are surrounded.
She jumps on his shoulder
The boulder jumps
and lands on a nearby stile.
The boulder spits out rocks
Amariys points a sword.
A tornado explodes from his sword, blasting away rocks, and striking the stile, which cracks and falls, bringing the boulder down with it.
Emul claps.
The boulder leaps of the falling stile.
In the canyons, Sunraku picks up the Decapitator
Label, Flame General's Decapitator
He strikes the belly of the boulder.
The belly cracks apart.
Her hammer bursts into flames and she swings.
The boulder shoots up in a burst of fire. It forms flaming cracks.
They run from the falling bomb.
He leaps and rides the blast wave.
The wave consumes them, then dissipates.
A rock falls on him. It has eyes and arms.
The moon shines through the clouds over the Ruins
Sunraku flies through the air with the decapitator.
He strikes a spiky golem. Light shines through it. He leaps away as it dissapears.
A stone figurine appears on the ground.
Amariys sidles up to Bilac
She bats him away with her hammer.
A hole in the ground
It resembles an elevator shaft.
The party is viewed from a distance.
A crystal chandelier turns
Sunraku wears a tophat. Behind him, glittering theater lights read Shangri-La Frontier.
Katzo wears a suit and sits on red carpeted stairs.
Pencilgon wears a suit and leans against a railing.
Animalia wears a suit and sits on a red velvet couch. She crosses her legs.
Professor wears a suit and sits in a red velvet chair by a red curtain.
Psyger-100 wears a suit with a loosened tie and untucked shirt. She sits on the floor.
A blue haired girl with a scar on her face wears a suit and smiles.
Emul wears a suit and sits on a pink disco ball.
Sunraku dances, foregrounded by bottles and wine glasses.
Rei wears a red dress.
She turns to us, smiles, and curtsies.
Sunraku takes off his hat.
Katzo turns to us and walks away, revealing Pencilgon sitting beyond her.
Pencilgon stands and leaves, revealing Emul, facing away from us. Emul turns.
The disco ball glitters gold. Silhouettes of Pencilgon, Sunraku, and Katzo clap in red windows.
The other suited characters clap in their own windows.
The chandelier turns.
The chandelier lights flicker.  Cut to black.
Text, 31, Fortune Teller Rock Roll
Rei enters the store.
